com.thirds.adl.interpret.tokens

Class Tokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thirds.adl.interpret.tokens.Tokenizer

  • public class Tokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Extracts tokens of ADL code from a file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int column
      Column number in each line.
      java.lang.String fileContents
      String containing all tokens to be interpreted.
      java.lang.String fileName
      Name of file, equivalent to path in constructor.
      int line
      Line number in fileContents.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Field Detail

      • fileContents

        public java.lang.String fileContents
        String containing all tokens to be interpreted.

      • fileName

        public java.lang.String fileName
        Name of file, equivalent to path in constructor.

      • line

        public int line
        Line number in fileContents. 1 is the first line.

      • column

        public int column
        Column number in each line. 1 is the first column.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tokenizer

        public Tokenizer(java.lang.String path,
                 AppDevLanguage game)
        Parameters:
        path - the relative path to the file to be tokenized
        game - the AppDevLanguage instance to allow the changeScreen function
